name: dragon's milk (peach flavour) v1
description:
My favourite drink. I get it from that corner store, from outside it's so hidden that you can barely even see it, let alone wanting to go inside... But everyday I thank myself for entering in for the first time that day. They sell things that you could never imagine existed. 
Now it's my regular spot for dragon's milk. The owner told me it was synthetic milk, according to him no dragon was harmed in the process... If you want to believe that.
And make sure you also ask about the points card. Apparently we can unlock a lot of mysterious perks when we get a full card stamped...
// (2021) pixel art made on 100x100 canvas then upscaled 300%
